archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.5.3a: a) taking into account the type, nature and strength of threats to the target environment and their ability to initiate threat events (e.g. a hacker introducing malware or an employee accidentally emailing sensitive information to an unauthorised recipient)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
